languages.text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего хода цель получает ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g}, на который не влияют броня и отражение. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

traits.locale_text: Deals (lethality / 10) rending damage that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turn. Lethality: a specific Assassin characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, whichever is higher.

Deals lethality/10 rending damage that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turn. Lethality: a specific Assassin's characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, depending on which of those is higher.

Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

languages.text: В начале каждого своего хода цель получает ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего урона{/g}, на который не влияют броня и отражение. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} — в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.
languages.original_text: Deals (lethality / 10) rending damage that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turn. Lethality: a specific Assassin characteristic that is equal to dodge or dodge penetration, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: В начале каждого своего хода цель получает (число уровней летальности / 10) раздирающего урона, на который не влияют броня и отражение урона. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

В начале каждого своего хода цель получает (число уровней летальности / 10) раздирающего урона, на который не влияют броня и отражение урона. Летальность: особый показатель, который используется ассасином, равный уклонению или снижению уклонения – в зависимости от того, какое значение выше.

languages.text: 目标每个回合开始时，受到（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}/10）点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，此伤害无视护甲与偏转。 致命：刺客的特殊属性，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}两者较高值。
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: 目标每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到（致命/10）点撕裂伤害，此伤害无视{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。 致命：刺客的特殊属性，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或闪避穿透两者较高值。

languages.text: Inflige ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} / 10) de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g} que ignora la armadura y el desvío al comienzo de cada uno de los turnos del objetivo. Letalidad: Característica exclusiva del asesino que equivale a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, la que sea más alta.
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: Inflige (letalidad / 10) de daño acerado que ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} al comienzo de cada uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} del objetivo. Letalidad: característica exclusiva del asesino que equivale a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o a su penetración de esquiva, la que sea más alta.

languages.text: Verursacht ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g}, der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Ziels ignoriert. Lethalität: ein spezieller {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g}-Parameter, der dem Wert für {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweich-Reduktion{/g} entspricht; je nachdem, welcher höher ist.
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht (Lethalität / 10) durchdringenden Schaden, der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Ziels ignoriert. Lethalität: eine spezielle Assassinen-Eigenschaft, die dem Wert für {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} oder Ausweichdurchdringung entspricht; je nachdem, welcher höher ist.

languages.text: Inflige ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} / 10) points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g} qui ignorent l'armure et la déflexion au début de chaque tour de la cible. Létalité : caractéristique propre à l'assassin, égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, selon la valeur la plus élevée.
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: Inflige (létalité / 10) points de dégâts perforants qui ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible. Létalité : caractéristique propre à l'Assassin, égale à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou à la pénétration d'esquive, selon la valeur la plus élevée.

languages.text: ターゲットの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}を無視する（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}/10）の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を与える。 致死率：{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}特有のステータス。{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避貫通{/g}のうち、高い方の値に等しい。
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} at the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}. Lethality: a specific {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}を無視する（致死率/10）の裂傷ダメージを与える。 致死率：アサシン特有のステータス。{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}または回避貫通のうち、高い方の値に等しい。

languages.text: Hedefin turu her başladığında, zırhı ve saptırmayı yok sayan ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarı{/g} verir. Öldürücülük: {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımına{/g} eşit olan (hangisi yüksekse), Suikastçı'ya has bir parametre.
languages.original_text: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores armour and deflection at the beginning of each of the target's turns. Lethality: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
